name: Showreel Sina Anders
description:
Interactive Showreel

I'm Sina, 22 years old and I study 3D Animation in Austria. This was my first attempt on creating a game with Unity on my own. Here I show you a few examples of the models, textures and animations I did. Additionally you'll see a mini-showreel of the Game Jam I host biannually, since game design is something I'm really passionate about and would love to learn more about!

Let's get in touch, if you like what I do :)
